unknown subckt: Check if the required library is included using `.include <filename>.lib`.
singular matrix: This usually happens due to floating/unconnected nodes. Connect all nodes properly.
timestep too small: Reduce timestep in `.tran` statement or adjust component values.
convergence problem: Try adding `.options reltol=1e-3 abstol=1e-12` or provide better initial conditions.
undefined model: Ensure `.model` statements are present for all transistors/diodes.
